import "./App.css"; import * as math from "mathjs"; import MathJax from "react-mathjax"; function App() { const tex = `\\pi i \\xi x} \\,d\\xi`; const myFunction = (oper1) => { if (oper1 === 0) { return 1; } else { return oper1 * myFunction(oper1 - 1); } }; const myFunction2 = (oper2) => { return math.derivative(oper2, "x"); }; const myFunction3 = (oper3) => { var b = oper3.split(",").map(function (item) { return parseInt(item, 10); }); return math.nthRoots(b[0], b[1])[0]; }; return (
(document.calc.txt.value = eval( document.calc.txt.value * (Math.PI / 180.0) )) } > Rad (document.calc.txt.value = eval( document.calc.txt.value * (180 / Math.PI) )) } > Deg (document.calc.txt.value = eval(myFunction(document.calc.txt.value))) } > x! (document.calc.txt.value += ")")}> ) (document.calc.txt.value += "(")}> ( (document.calc.txt.value = eval( Math.trunc(document.calc.txt.value / 10) )) } > CE (document.calc.txt.value = "")} > C (document.calc.txt.value = Math.asin(document.calc.txt.value)) } > aSin (document.calc.txt.value = Math.acos(document.calc.txt.value)) } > aCos (document.calc.txt.value = Math.atan(document.calc.txt.value)) } > aTan (document.calc.txt.value += "**")}> y^x (document.calc.txt.value = Math.log10(document.calc.txt.value)) } > log10 (document.calc.txt.value = eval(Math.log(document.calc.txt.value))) } > ln (document.calc.txt.value += "*")}> * (document.calc.txt.value = Math.sin(document.calc.txt.value)) } > Sin (document.calc.txt.value = Math.cos(document.calc.txt.value)) } > Cos (document.calc.txt.value = Math.tan(document.calc.txt.value)) } > Tan (document.calc.txt.value += "7")}> 7 (document.calc.txt.value += "8")}> 8 (document.calc.txt.value += "9")}> 9 (document.calc.txt.value += "/")}> / (document.calc.txt.value = Math.PI)} > (document.calc.txt.value = eval(1 / document.calc.txt.value)) } > Inv (document.calc.txt.value = eval(Math.log(document.calc.txt.value))) } > ln (document.calc.txt.value += "4")}> 4 (document.calc.txt.value += "5")}> 5 (document.calc.txt.value += "6")}> 6 (document.calc.txt.value += "-")}> - (document.calc.txt.value += eval(Math.exp(1)))} > e (document.calc.txt.value = eval(Math.sqrt(document.calc.txt.value))) } > (document.calc.txt.value += ".")}> . (document.calc.txt.value += "3")}> 3 (document.calc.txt.value += "2")}> 2 (document.calc.txt.value += "1")}> 1 (document.calc.txt.value += "+")} > + (document.calc.txt.value += "^")}> ^ (document.calc.txt.value += "x")}> x (document.calc.txt.value = eval(myFunction2(document.calc.txt.value))) } > d/dx (document.calc.txt.value = eval(myFunction3(document.calc.txt.value))) } > nth root (document.calc.txt.value += ",")}> , (document.calc.txt.value += "0")} > 0 (document.calc.txt.value = eval(document.calc.txt.value)) } > =
); } export default App;
